sections.text:
79-728.Kindergarten programs; required.

All school districts shall offer a kindergarten program.

SourceLaws 1988, LB 1197, ยง 2;R.S.1943, (1994), ยง 79-201.11;Laws 1996, LB 900, ยง 402;Laws 2018, LB377, ยง 59.

Cross ReferencesKindergarten, entrance requirements, see section 79-214.
